metadata.title: CVE-2021-47620 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: refactor malicious adv data checkCheck for out-of-bound read was being performed at the end of whilenum_reports loop, and would fill journal with false positives. Addedcheck to beginning of loop processing so that it doesn't get checkedafter ptr has been advanced.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
